1.「……ちょっと待った <pc>ちゃん！| アンタ 今 なんつった！？: Wait a minute... What did you just say?

2.「ヒゲのマルコってヤツが パチもん作って| 依頼人を ダマしてるって言ったのかッ: You're telling me this Mustached Marco guy is|cheating his clients by making crackers?

3.「ありえねぇ…だろ……？| なんで…… なんで あの人が| そんな詐欺師みてえな: Impossible... right? Why... why is that guy|acting like a fraud...

4.「ワリイ…… <pc>ちゃん……。| いきなり スゴむようなマネしちまって。|: Wally... <pc>... you've come out of|nowhere to make a big deal out of me. But you|see, this Mustached Marco...

6.「オレの両親ってのは えらい働き者でさ。| 朝から晩まで ずっと働きづめだった。: My parents were very hard workers. They worked|from morning till night. I was always alone.

7.「そんなオレを さみしさから救ってくれたのが| ふらっと町に現れた 流しのランプ: But then Marco's Alchemy Lamp, the mustached|Marco, appeared in town on a whim and saved me|from my loneliness...

8.「当時は おっちゃんって呼んで なついてた。| おっちゃんのマネして ランプ錬金:
At the time, I called him "O-chan" (old man)|and he was very fond of me. When I imitated|him and smelted lamps, he praised me for my|
|talent...

9.「それでさ おっちゃんが 次の町に行くって時| オレは 泣いて引き止めたよ……。:
So when Pops was leaving for the next town, I|cried and told him I didn't want him to|leave... that I wanted him to stay here|
|forever. I just...

11.「だから オレは ラン錬職人になって ここまで| 駆け抜けたんだ。ギルドマスター:
That's why I became a run smelter and ran all|the way here. I thought that if I became a|guild master, I would be able to meet my|
|father someday...

12.「それなのに……| なんで 人をダマすようなコトしてんだよ！| ラン錬職人は 夢: So... why are you trying to fool people! I|thought being an orchid smelter was about|giving people dreams!

13.「おっちゃん……いや ヒゲのマルコ……！| いつか必ず アンタを見つけだして|: Pops... or Mustached Marco...! One day I'm|gonna find you and I'm gonna make you pay for|what you did.
